vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Mamre = "strength" or "fatness"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) an Amorite who allied himself with Abram
n pr loc
2) an oak grove on Mamre's land in Palestine where Abraham dwelt
3) a place near Abraham's burial place, apparently identified with Hebron
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
幔利 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "力量" 或 "肥沃"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 曾與亞伯蘭聯盟的亞摩利人
專有名詞 地名
2) 位於巴勒斯坦的幔利地的橡樹林, 亞伯拉罕曾在那裡居住
3) 一個靠近亞伯拉罕埋葬地之處, 可能就是"希伯崙"
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
幔利 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "力量" 或 "肥沃"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 曾与亚伯兰联盟的亚摩利人
专有名词 地名
2) 位于巴勒斯坦的幔利地的橡树林, 亚伯拉罕曾在那里居住
3) 一个靠近亚伯拉罕埋葬地之处, 可能就是"希伯仑"

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.14.13;
brother of: Eshcol (H0812) and Aner (H6063)
§ Mamre = "strength" or "fatness"
n pr m
1) an Amorite who allied himself with Abram
n pr loc
2) an oak grove on Mamre's land in Palestine where Abraham dwelt
3) a place near Abraham's burial place, apparently identified with Hebron
